lead_paragraph: A century-old Jersey City warehouse is being reimagined as 366 residential lofts available for rent.

headline.main: Jersey City Warehouse Converted to Rental Lofts

snippet: A century-old Jersey City warehouse is being reimagined as 366 residential lofts available for rent.
abstract: Developers rescue historic Butler Brothers warehouse building in Jersey City's Powerhouse Arts District from demolition; loft-style residences retain quirks of structures' manufacturing past while offering modern amenities.
